price: Wala si kauli ya kuhani. Ni machache mnayo yakumbuka.
arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
footnotes: Wala Qur'ani haisemi kwa maneno ya kumunyia munyia kama wanenavyo makuhani mlio wazoea. Ni uchache mno kukumbuka kwenu na kuzingatia khitilafu zilioko baina ya Qur'ani na maneno ya makuhani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walā biqawli kāhinin qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
